---

## Decision Template

Copy this template for new decisions:

```markdown
## YYYY-MM-DD: [Decision Title]

- **Context:** [What situation or problem prompted this decision?]
- **Decision:** [What did we decide to do?]
- **Alternatives Considered:**
  - Option A: [Description] - [Why rejected]
  - Option B: [Description] - [Why rejected]
- **Outcome:**
  - [What was implemented]
  - [Files changed]
  - [New patterns established]
- **Reasoning:** [Why this approach over others?]
- **References:** [Links to docs, issues, or discussions]
```

---

## Categories of Decisions

Common decision types to document:

- **Architecture** - Tech stack, folder structure, patterns
- **Security** - Auth approach, data protection, access control
- **Database** - Schema design, indexing, RLS policies
- **API** - Endpoint design, error handling, versioning
- **UI/UX** - Component library, styling approach, user flows
- **Infrastructure** - Hosting, CI/CD, monitoring
- **Business Logic** - Rules, workflows, edge cases
